name: bathymetric
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
involving the study or measurement of the depth of water in an ocean, sea, or lake: a bathymetric survey of the lake Bathymetric charts indicate the depths of water and are used to show submarine topographic features. See
bathymetry
More examplesFewer examplesAtlantic marine species have a shallower upper bathymetric limit in the west than in the east.Explorers searched the Mediterranean, using sonar, bathymetric surveys, and remotely operated vehicles.Detailed bathymetric mapping of the seafloor can accurately define the offshore extent of the San Andreas fault system.
